# nameFieldShouldBeDisplayed

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether to display the guest’s name should.

## Declaration

```swift
var nameFieldShouldBeDisplayed: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], which displays the guest’s name.

## Specifying Which Fields to Display

- **phoneNumberFieldShouldBeDisplayed**: A Boolean value indicating whether to display the guest’s phone number.
- **emailAddressFieldShouldBeDisplayed**: A Boolean value indicating whether to display the guest’s email address.
